effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect_entries.short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
